lead_paragraph: Quarterback Brady Quinn signed a five-year contract with the Cleveland Browns, ending an 11-day holdout that essentially eliminated his chances to begin the season as the team’s starter. He missed 16 practices during his holdout.The deal, worth $20.2 million, with $7.75 million guaranteed, could reach $30 million over five years with incentives.
